::Jhiaxus::

Jhiaxus takes the helmet but looks over at the screens.

Jhiaxus: Before we start this, perhaps we should be absolutely certain of the situation at the Atlantis Maximal base. Someone use the sensore and tell me what I'll be sending this puppet into.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                               Perceptor Opened the pod and handle Jhiaxus a helmet. "You should 
 sit down, and remain in a safe place while you use this helmet your 
 brain's commands are directly sent to the puppet so literally you 
 will become him"
